name: battery-monitor
description: Native macOS battery monitor tray app using Electron

scripts.build:btctl: mkdir -p .logs && if command -v swift >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo '[btctl] Swift toolchain detected' && (swift build --package-path native/btctl -c release 2>&1 | tee .logs/btctl-build.log) && mkdir -p native/bin && cp native/btctl/.build/release/btctl native/bin/btctl || { echo '[btctl] Swift build failed; see .logs/btctl-build.log'; if [ -x native/bin/btctl ]; then echo '[btctl] Using existing native/bin/btctl'; else echo '[btctl] btctl not present; ensure Xcode Command Line Tools are installed (xcode-select --install)'; exit 1; fi; }; else echo '[btctl] Swift toolchain unavailable'; if [ -x native/bin/btctl ]; then echo '[btctl] Using existing native/bin/btctl'; else echo '[btctl] btctl not present; install Xcode or Swift toolchain'; exit 1; fi; fi
